trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of integers, which specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>.
trans-unit.target: Archivia una coppia ordinata di interi, specificare un <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The Size class is used to specify a height and width through the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A> property for <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> and other graphics classes.
trans-unit.target: La classe di dimensione viene utilizzata per specificare un'altezza e larghezza tramite la <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>, <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>e altre classi di grafica.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can perform operations on a Size by using the overloaded operators such as <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire operazioni su una dimensione tramite gli operatori di overload, ad esempio <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Equality%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Subtraction%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.op_Addition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the Size structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: L'unità per il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>delle dimensioni della struttura dipendono le <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>le impostazioni per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto utilizzato per disegnare.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on GetHashCode for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Size> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare a seconda di GetHashCode per i valori univoci, come due <xref:System.Drawing.Size>oggetti con gli stessi valori per i relativi <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>proprietà possono restituire lo stesso codice hash.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento potrebbe cambiare nelle versioni future.
